author: RussoDaFederal

defaultParameters.description: Map object ID. -1 is self, 0 is hero
defaultParameters.name: id

defaultParameters.description: Direction, in degrees. 0 is east, 90 is north, 180 is west and 270 is south
defaultParameters.name: dir

defaultParameters.description: Whether to move according to camera orientation
defaultParameters.name: camera

commands.description: Move object of given ID in specified direction
commands.name: Move

description: This plugin adds a simple command to move any map object a step (not a square) in any direction, defined by angle (in degrees) and not orientation.
name: Move in all directions
